attributes.review: I really had astronomically high expectations for my favorite flaming hot Cheeto and his “professional” presidential campaign. Sadly this app kept glitching and being slow. Also, the FBI agent through my phone texted me if I was mentally stable when I downloaded this app. I was so embarrassed😬so I won’t forget that mr. trump
attributes.title: So sorry

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my wonderful orange president 🤤✨🥵 but then when I opened it he popped out of my phone! When I yelled at him to leave he got upset 🤬 and ran into my closet! He’s literally been in there for hours and I can hear him breathing 😩. Please don’t download this app!!!
attributes.title: He’s in my closet

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’d ever had it started to take money away from me for no reason and it makes your phone slow as hell it also drains ur battery very fast and spies on you this app should not be aloud in the App Store what’s so ever I highly recommend it be removed
attributes.title: Worst App

attributes.review: First this app made my phone lag horribly!!! And i thought it was just my phone or maybe the internet but right when i deleted this app my phone started functioning perfectly again!!! This app has to have some type of bug or SOMETHING!!! NEVER DOWNLOADING THIS CRAP EVER AGAIN!!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS AWFUL!!!

attributes.review: I have never owned a worse app. The moment i open the app my phone exploded and resulted in the loss of both of my hands!!! Now i have no hands and i have to write this review with my toes!!!!!!!!!! I was going to vote for trump but now because of what this app has done to me i will vote for literally ANYONE ELSE!!!
attributes.title: Trash App

attributes.review: It absolutely horrible, when I opened the app my phone crashed and went completely black. You know I just wanted to see my favorite Cheeto puff Oompa Loompa whose name is apparently “Donald trump” I also wanted to see his hot son whose name is Barron 🤪🤪. And Donald sweety, grow a dick please, I wonder how you got ur wife prego 🤷🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: Why make an app like this?

attributes.review: I opened this app and immediately got child molestar vibes from it. I also got a message telling me that it doesn’t accept Mexicans and that for that reason I should leave. Overall I feel like this app is terrible and shouldn’t be allowed in the US.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: Ok where do I start who in the world was like *ok who do me vote let’s vote this racist Cheeto cuz I have no mind *like why dould trump got to be a racist Cheeto like bro your head look like a Cheeto cuz every time I see it I wanna eat and kill it and don’t get started on his hair bro your hair look like from 1985 who did your hair a racist Cheeto yea YEET!
attributes.title: We hate dould trump

attributes.review: We all know trump is a horrible president, but this app is worse. Now I know that y’all are thinking “how is that possible” well believe me, if I knew I’d tell y’all. This app punched my dying grandmother. She was minding her own business when DJT came in and punched her and her cats. Horrible Horrible Horrible.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I opened the app and an Orange came at my face at 100 mph so it triggered my fight or flight and when i hopped out of bed I started to hallucinate and discovered that the app was trying mind games but i was too strong to fall for it. If you are gullible and want to be brainwashed this is the app for you!
attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE
